bean.name: SimpleScheduledRoutePolicy
bean.title: Simple Scheduled Route Policy
bean.description: A basic RoutePolicy that can be used to start/stop routes using fixed intervals.

routeStartRepeatCount.description: Maximum number of times the route should be started

routeStartRepeatInterval.description: Interval (in millis) how often the route should be started

routeStopRepeatCount.description: Maximum number of times the route should be stopped

routeStopRepeatInterval.description: Interval (in millis) how often the route should be stopped

routeSuspendRepeatCount.label: advanced
routeSuspendRepeatCount.description: Maximum number of times the route should be suspended

routeSuspendRepeatInterval.label: advanced
routeSuspendRepeatInterval.description: Interval (in millis) how often the route should be suspended

routeResumeRepeatCount.label: advanced
routeResumeRepeatCount.description: Maximum number of times the route should be resumed

routeResumeRepeatInterval.label: advanced
routeResumeRepeatInterval.description: Interval (in millis) how often the route should be resumed
